abstract: James Hill shares photos of Sochi Olympic Park, one year after the 2014 Games.
lead_paragraph: Common to the postscript of every Olympics, and especially the very expensive Games in Sochi, Russia, is the difficult task of moving beyond past glories and recouping the investment.

headline.main: Photos: Hardly a City Frozen in Time
